headline: Marriott's $15M Bet Explodes Overnight
summary: A $15M hospitality experiment ends in chaos as Sonder collapses, leaving Marriott guests locked out and lawsuits flying.

raw.headline: Marriott's $15M Bet Explodes Overnight
raw.summary: A $15M hospitality experiment ends in chaos as Sonder collapses, leaving Marriott guests locked out and lawsuits flying.

headline: What Airbnb (ABNB)'s CTO Departure and Growing Rental Flexibility Signal for Its Competitive Edge
summary: On November 18, 2025, Aristotle Balogh notified Airbnb that he would step down as Chief Technology Officer in December 2025, remaining in an advisory non-executive capacity through at least February 2026 to support the transition. Separately, Apartment List announced new search features for Airbnb-friendly apartments across 25 cities, highlighting rising demand from younger renters seeking hosting flexibility as a means to improve financial health. We'll now explore how the CTO transition...

headline: 3 Large-Cap Stocks Worth Investigating
summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.

raw.headline: 3 Large-Cap Stocks Worth Investigating
raw.summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.

headline: Inside Marriott’s Disastrous Bet on Short-Term Rental Company Sonder
summary: Investment added rooms for hotel chain, but apartment-rental firm collapsed under high-cost leases. ‘Everything kind of went straight downhill,’ said one manager.

raw.headline: Inside Marriott’s Disastrous Bet on Short-Term Rental Company Sonder
